citations.narrative:
A complaint was received by Animal Care regarding safe animal handling practices at the facility. Upon looking into the
matter, there were insufficient barriers on the entry/exit for the drive-thru safari buses that could allow animals to interact
with employees and members of the public in an unsafe manner. Insufficient distance and/or barriers may lead to harm,
stress, or threat to safety to the animals and to the public. The licensee must ensure any animals are handled so there is
minimal risk of harm to the animal and to the public during public exhibition. Corrective actions have been implemented at
the time of the inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.

narrative:
2.131(c)(1) 
   
Handling of animals. 
A complaint was received by Animal Care regarding safe animal handling practices at the facility. Upon looking into the 
matter, there were insufficient barriers on the entry/exit for the drive-thru safari buses that could allow animals to interact 
with employees and members of the public in an unsafe manner. Insufficient distance and/or barriers may lead to harm, 
stress, or threat to safety to the animals and to the public. The licensee must ensure any animals are handled so there is 
minimal risk of harm to the animal and to the public during public exhibition. Corrective actions have been implemented at 
the time of the inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
